duties_responsibilities.duty: Schedule outpatient diagnostic procedures such as radiology and imaging procedures.
Validate outpatient orders and capture patient demographic and insurance information.
Contact patients or providers to schedule outpatient diagnostic procedures.
Compile patient information such as diagnosis, reason for procedure, medications, and allergies prior to scheduled procedure.
Monitor inbound orders process and ensure orders are validated and routed appropriately.
Contact affected departments to ensure patient is prepared and necessary personnel and equipment are available.
Meet telephone system metrics and productivity standards set by the department.
